QuestData.Title: Myzrael's Tale
QuestData.Description: As the stone goes quiet, you're left with a vague sense of unease. Something isn't right.$B$BPerhaps you should tell Zaruk of what you've done so far.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Zaruk at Hammerfall in Arathi Highlands.
QuestData.RewardText: I know, $n. I should not have sent you.$B$BForgive me... the whispers of the past are sometimes too strong.
